title: Segmentation Data
description: JSON containing pixel coordinates of different segments in an image

segments.description: Divides the entire image into different segments where each segment indicates a noteworthy region or structure. For example a park image would be divided into sections that contain grass, sections that contain trees etc.

items.description: Contains information about each individual segment in an image. Information such as area, centre of segment etc are included in this section.

contours.description: The separate contours making up the segment.

contour.description: A single contour of a segment as detected. Each contour is a separate region.

coordinates.description: The normalized coordinates forming the contour as returned by OpenCV.

allOf.description: The center of the contour with normalized coordinates.

area.description: The area of the image taken by this contour

allOf.description: The overall centroid of the segment with normalized coordinates.

area.description: Total area occupied by the segment in a given image, normalized between 0 and 1.
